title: Little Farms Cafe Restaurants and Groceries
blurb: Restaurants offering dining and grocery shopping.
description: Little Farms is a group of restaurants that offer dining experiences and grocery shopping. Locations include Katong Point, Tanglin Mall, Holland Village, Valley Point, Serangoon Gardens, Sentosa, and One Raffles Place. They host upcoming events such as Taste of Western Australia and A Caribbean Affair. Little Farms also offers corporate bookings and events. The restaurants provide a family-friendly atmosphere with options for both dining in and purchasing groceries. They focus on fresh, high-quality ingredients and cater to a wide range of tastes. Little Farms aims to provide a community hub where families can enjoy good food and shop for groceries in a relaxed setting. The cafe offers a variety of dishes suitable for both adults and children, making it a convenient option for family outings. The grocery section includes fresh produce, meats, and other items to cater to families' needs.

title: Little Farms Table, Sentosa Cove Restaurant
blurb: Dine in with us Little Farms Restaurants.
description: Little Farms Table at Sentosa Cove offers unforgettable dining with exceptional quality, served with heart. Enjoy a delightful culinary experience in a family-friendly atmosphere. The restaurant provides a welcoming environment for families to dine together, offering a diverse menu with options for both adults and children. The location is perfect for a relaxed meal after a day of fun at Sentosa. The restaurant prides itself on using fresh, high-quality ingredients to create delicious and memorable dishes. The ambiance is designed to be comfortable and inviting, making it an ideal spot for family gatherings and special occasions. The staff are dedicated to providing excellent service, ensuring that every guest has a pleasant dining experience. The menu includes a variety of options, from healthy salads to hearty mains, catering to different tastes and dietary preferences. The restaurant also offers a selection of desserts and beverages to complete your meal. The overall experience is designed to be enjoyable and convenient for families, with attention to detail in every aspect of the dining experience.

title: Little Farms Restaurants
blurb: Unforgettable Dining, Exceptional Quality, Served with Heart.
description: Little Farms Restaurants offer a dining experience focused on exceptional quality and heartfelt service. They cater to group functions, corporate events, and birthdays, providing a venue for various occasions. The restaurants emphasize fresh ingredients and a welcoming atmosphere for families and individuals alike. The menu features a range of dishes suitable for different tastes, ensuring a memorable dining experience for all guests. The focus is on creating a space where people can enjoy good food and company in a relaxed setting. The restaurants aim to provide a high-quality dining experience with a focus on fresh, quality ingredients.

title: Little Farms Bistro, Katong Point Restaurant
blurb: In the heart of Joo Chiat, open daily for dining.
description: Little Farms Bistro at Katong Point offers a delightful dining experience with a focus on fresh, high-quality ingredients. The bistro provides a relaxed atmosphere suitable for families and individuals alike. Enjoy a diverse menu featuring brunch, lunch, and dinner options, including vegetarian and gluten-free choices. The restaurant is committed to sourcing sustainable and ethically produced food, ensuring a healthy and delicious meal for everyone. Perfect for a family outing or a casual meal with friends, Little Farms Bistro provides a welcoming environment and exceptional service.

title: Little Farms Cafe, Valley Point Restaurant
blurb: Along Bustling River Valley, open daily for dining.
description: Little Farms Cafe at Valley Point offers a cozy and inviting atmosphere for families and individuals. Located along the bustling River Valley, the cafe provides a convenient spot to enjoy a delicious meal or a quick snack. The menu features a variety of options, including breakfast items, sandwiches, salads, and pastries, all made with fresh, high-quality ingredients. The cafe is committed to providing a family-friendly environment with options for both adults and children. Whether you're looking for a place to relax or a quick bite to eat, Little Farms Cafe is the perfect choice.

title: Little Farms Bar+Grill, Serangoon Gardens Restaurant
blurb: Open daily in Serangoon Gardens for dining.
description: Little Farms Bar+Grill in Serangoon Gardens offers a vibrant and family-friendly dining experience. The restaurant features a diverse menu with grilled dishes, salads, and other delicious options made with fresh, high-quality ingredients. The bar area provides a relaxed atmosphere for adults, while the dining area is suitable for families with children. The restaurant is committed to sourcing sustainable and ethically produced food, ensuring a healthy and enjoyable meal for everyone. Perfect for a family dinner or a casual gathering with friends, Little Farms Bar+Grill provides a welcoming environment and exceptional service.

title: Little Farms Table, Tanglin Mall Restaurant
blurb: Open daily in Tanglin Mall for dining experiences.
description: Little Farms Table at Tanglin Mall offers a sophisticated yet family-friendly dining experience. The restaurant features a diverse menu with a focus on fresh, high-quality ingredients sourced from local and international producers. The ambiance is welcoming and suitable for both casual meals and special occasions. Families can enjoy a variety of dishes, including vegetarian and gluten-free options. The restaurant is committed to providing exceptional service and creating a memorable dining experience for all guests. Perfect for a family outing or a relaxed meal with friends, Little Farms Table provides a delightful culinary journey.

The restaurant features a diverse menu with a focus on fresh, high-quality ingredients sourced from local and international producers. The ambiance is relaxed and inviting, making it suitable for both casual meals and special occasions. Families can enjoy a variety of dishes, including vegetarian and gluten-free options. title: Little Farms Table, Sentosa - Fresh Whole Foods
blurb: Delicious, fresh and clean whole foods from around world!
description: Little Farms Table in Sentosa offers a delightful dining experience with a focus on fresh, whole foods sourced from around the world. The restaurant provides a family-friendly atmosphere where parents and children can enjoy nutritious and tasty meals together. The menu features a variety of options, including dishes made with organic produce and sustainable ingredients. It's a great place for families to relax and enjoy a healthy meal while taking in the beautiful surroundings of Sentosa. The restaurant is open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner, making it a convenient choice for families visiting the island.
full_address: Little Farms Table, Sentosa Monday- Sunday: 7:30am - 10:00pm 1 Cove Ave, Sentosa #02-14 Singapore 098537 Book Now Little Farms Cafe, Valley Point Fri-Sat: 7
